title: The Name of the Wind
author: Patrick Rothfuss
summary: A high fantasy novel following the life of Kvothe, a magically gifted young man who grows to be the most notorious wizard his world has ever seen.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
summary: A gripping story of a marriage gone terribly wrong, full of suspense, mind games, and a strong, complex female lead.

title: People We Meet on Vacation
author: Emily Henry
summary: Two best friends take one last vacation together to see if they can turn their friendship into something more.
